channel.title: CVE Feed for Accusoft -- ImageGear
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Accusoft -- ImageGear

item.title: CVE-2021-40398|2024-08-04T02:44:09.601Z -- accusoft -- imagegear
item.description: An out-of-bounds write vulnerability exists in the parse_raster_data functionality of Accusoft ImageGear 19.10. A specially-crafted malformed file can lead to memory corruption. An attacker can provide a malicious file to trigger this vulnerability.
